summary: In Wyoming, Sweetwater town sheriff Stan Blaine finds himself in the middle of a range war between greedy cattle barons and newcomer settlers who compete for public lands and unbranded stray cattle.
cast: Maureen O'Hara|Alex Nicol|William Bishop|Robert Strauss|Alexander Scourby|Gregg Palmer|Jack Kelly|Jeanne Cooper|Dennis Weaver|Stacy Harris|Fred Aldrich|Betty Allen|David Alpert|Carl Andre|Emile Avery|Joe Bailey|Joe Bassett|Ray Bennett|Fred Carson|Edmund Cobb|Bill Coontz|Clem Fuller|Harold Goodwin|Herman Hack|Chick Hannan|Charles Horvath|Larry Hudson|George Huggins|Jack Hyde|Ray Jones|Donald Kerr|Keith Kerrigan|Merrill McCormick|Philo McCullough|Robert Merrick|Boyd 'Red' Morgan|Lew Morphy|Anton Northpole|William H. O'Brien|Joe Phillips|Bob Reeves|Buddy Roosevelt|Syd Saylor|David Sharpe|George Sowards|George Taylor|Claudette Thornton|Jack Tornek|Sailor Vincent|Rush Williams|Henry Wills
title: La pelirroja de Wyoming
